# The `HasReferenceResolver` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Do not resolve anything, but keep track of whether a given variable was referenced. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::HasReferenceResolver</CodeBlock>

<MembersIndex>

  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/resolver">Resolver</a></>}>

## Description {#details}

Do not resolve anything, but keep track of whether a given variable was referenced.
